game.name: Anunnaki & The Kingdom of Goku
game.shortDescription: Anunnaki & The Kingdom of Goku is a surreal RTS-TPS game about Goku, the legendary monkey king, who must reclaim his kingdom from the dreaded Illuminati and their masters. Destroy the invaders, reclaim your power, and ascend to the Heavens and stars above. In a dark time, the weapon is hope.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Anunnaki & The Kingdom of Goku is a surreal RTS-TPS game about Goku, the legendary monkey king, who must reclaim his kingdom from the dreaded Illuminati and their masters. Destroy the invaders, reclaim your power, and ascend to the Heavens and stars above. In a dark time, the weapon is hope.
